metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8021 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: a Improper Access Control vulnerability in of Open Build Service allows remote attackers to read files of an OBS package where the sourceaccess/access is disabled This issue affects: Open Build Service versions prior to 2.10.5.

criterions.comment: obs-build package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
